permitHolder: BAIS FRIEDA CHILD CARE CENTER INC

latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Compliance Inspection of Open Violations - Previously cited violations corrected

infractions.Violation Summary: At the time of inspection child care service failed to maintain a minimum of 30 square feet of space per child
infractions.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to arrange/conduct criminal/SCR background clearance checks for required individuals failed to re-clear required individuals with the SCR every two years
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had an age appropriate medical evaluation
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service unable to document that all children enrolled have had age appropriate immunizations unless a child is exempt
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service allows staff to perform their duties that are not healthy or are incapable of carrying out their duties Staff medical clearances are not maintained by child care service
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At the time child care service was providing care it has been determined that the child care service failed to limit areas used by children to their exclusive use Unauthorized children and/or adults allowed to inhabit child care service facilities during child care hours
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Permit application is incomplete
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service teaching staff acting as assistant teachers do not meet age and educational requirements

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to maintain childrens daily attendance records
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide or maintain record of staff immunizations
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to ensure staff received required training within time frames and/or failed to maintain training records
violations.Category: Minor violations General Violations
